trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref:System.String> to and from instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的執行個體<xref:System.String>的執行個體，以及<xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This class is typically only utilized by the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> for serialization purposes.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別通常只能使用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>進行序列化。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Converters.Int32RectValueSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Converters.Int32RectValueSerializer"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref:System.String> can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref:System.String>可以轉換成的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: String to evaluate for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要評估以進行轉換的字串。

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 用來進行轉換的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref> can be converted to a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref>可以轉換成<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要評估以進行轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 用來進行轉換的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: if value can be converted into a ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 可以轉換成，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.String> into a <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref:System.String>到<xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The implementation uses <xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> internally.
trans-unit.target: 實作會使用<xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>內部。</xref:System.Windows.Int32Rect.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The string to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的字串。

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 用來進行轉換的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of based on the supplied value.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體根據所提供 value 。

trans-unit.source: Converts an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref> to a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref>至<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert into a string.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換為字串的物件。

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 用來進行轉換的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的字串表示法<xref href="System.Windows.Int32Rect"> </xref>。
